version_description: General improvements

We are constantly improving calimoto to make your adventures along our winding routes even more amazing!
Check out our newest updates:

- iPhone X compatible
- Performance improvements
- Tour sharing via Facebook

- gone are the map restrictions, use the app on whatever continent you see fit
- additionally to stationary radar traps, their mobile counterparts are now visible as well
- improved map visuals
- better explanations for new users

- Add POIs to your route
- 3D rendering of buildings
- These Points-Of-Interest are now shown in the map: biker hangouts, gas stations, food places, lodging, ATMs, bike shops and mountain passes. You can add them to your current trip or integrate them in a planned route. The planned route can then be saved, shared or reloaded.
- Running out of gas? Add a quick pit stop to your trip by letting calimoto find the closest gas station for you or choose from a list of gas stations near you. 
- We added 3D rendering of buildings in our maps for a more realistic visualisation.
General improvements

- corrected app behaviour when finishing a navigation, as well as when adding markers to an ongoing navigation
- optimized experience for users of different calendars
- multiple bugs were squashed, hard!

- Changed color of the free region boundary, to differentiate it from other items on the map
- Some users experienced problems with driven tours not appearing in their tour list, until after they restarted the app. This should be fixed now thanks to your feedback!

This update may contain traces of wheat, nuts or gluten. Other than that it contains subtle improvements to the overall navigation experience and will fix some issues when migrating to another device.

- fixed multiple little errors that occurred during the navigation thanks to user feedback
- stability improvements
- General improvements

- General improvements
Thank you for all the feedback and enjoy the ride with calimoto!

- Based on your feedbacks we increased the contrast of some texts in the app for better visibility.
- When you plan a route directly in the map, the address of your waypoints will automatically show in the search field box under the tab “planner”.
- Bug fixes and performance improvement.

Awesome new features:
- Customize your bluetooth audio settings
- More control over zoom level in navigation and tracking mode
- Jump to a point in your route when you're closer to a waypoint than the start
- When your OS quits the app abruptly, your track will now automically be saved as backup

You've been bugged by crashes? We're really sorry about this! We fixed a bug that sneaked in version 2.1.0 and caused crashing the app in navigation mode. There was another one that occured when pressing the trash can button while moving around markers. Please help us catch these sneaky little bugs by reporting them!

- You can now find mountain passes by searching for their name in the address search field.
- When you look up an address, we now show you distance to this place right next to the search results.
- You now have the option to skip the next waypoint.
- General improvements and performance tweaks

- Fixed an error that made it impossible for some users to place points and open tours outside their free area
- General performance improvements

You can now analyse lean angle and acceleration data from all you rides*

Now it's up to you how you get to your next waypoint! 
Choose from 4 options: 
- fastest route
- fastest route avoiding highways
- windy
- and super windy*

We have improved our voice instructions so keeping calimoto in your pocket should work even better.

*available for premium users only

- General improvements
- fixed some memory issues

- Inspire other riders to follow your lead!
Make your rides public and allow others to download them with an upcoming update.

Keep memories of your calimoto rides!
Take pictures during your rides or attach them later.
- We're automatically recovering your ride when calimoto was forced to shut down.
calimoto is now available for your Bosch mySPIN motorcycle smartphone integration system.

- Take a photo during your ride and add it to a point in the map where you’ve taken it.
- General improvements
- Better design

- General improvements
- Improvements for better use

- iOS 10 improvements
- Storage problems got fixed

Your Profile got a complete rework. It's a lot clearer now. We hope you like it. 
We fixed a lot of small bugs and inconsistencies, so that you can enjoy your next ride even more.

If you have questions or suggestions feel free to contact us: support@calimoto.com.

What's new? 
Save your favorite spots and most visited places as "favorites" to make trip planning even more easy. While navigating we give you a heads up when there is a danger zone ahead. Now you’ll get the same when you’re in tracking mode! Danger zones will also be shown directly in the map when you plan your ride. And you can also share your rides with your buddies directly from the map now.

Got any ideas for awesome updates or new features? Want to report a bug? Then send us an email to support@calimoto.com

Have a great ride!
Your calimoto team

What's new? Save your favorite spots and most visited places as "favorites" to make trip planning even more easy! 

Got any ideas for awesome updates or new features? Want to report a bug? Then send us an email to support@calimoto.com
Have a great ride!
Your calimoto team

With this update a couple of bugs should be resolved and there’s also a teeny-tiny new thing: Danger zones will be highlighted in your saved rides now.
Some of you have reported that when starting a round trip the first route setting changes back to default. In iOS 12, backups of tracked routes sometimes got lost. This shouldn’t happen anymore! Sometimes, the marker of your location didn’t move in tracking or navigation mode. And something strange happened, too: When you came across a mobile speed cam, all following cams (mobile and stationary) were shown as mobile. We hope that these bugs won’t bother you no more!
If you come across a bug or have any issues, please send an email to support@calimoto.com and help us improve the app!
Thanks and have a good weekend, 

Your calimoto team

This update contains a few small bug fixes and general performance improvements. Furthermore it may contain traces of nuts or gluten. We're constantly striving to create the best motor cycle experience for you, which is only made possible by your support and constant feedback so keep it coming by writing to suppor@calimoto.com 

Furthermore we added a new video and screenshots to the App Store.

This is another update filled with minor improvements and many fine details. Most changes were only possible with your support so keep the feedback coming:
- The little guy who’s responsible for the book keeping of your routes got an extra round of training. Fully motivated to improve his processes, he applied his new skills making the process of saving and recovering routes after the app has been closed more reliable.
- Every now and then a marker in the map forgot its routing profile after being dragged. We sent them all to rehab so their memory is no longer gold fisch level anymore.
- Markers in the map representing your favorites were a little off. A spa weekend later they are back on track!
- The camera operator responsible for composing your view onto the map used to prefer a plain and simple scene. We made him open up to new ideas and he made some of the transitions more elaborate.
- The old phones out there formed a union and striked for newer code, especially when it comes to location search. We came to terms with them, so all functions should be working as expected again.
- We moved. In order to make sure that your love letters will still reach us, we updated our address in the app.

Losing track of your massive bike family? Not anymore! calimoto is here to help!
Honda Gold Wing, Can-Am Spyder or Piaggio MP3: Now you can neatly organize all the members of your gas-fueled tribe directly in your profile.

Got any ideas for awesome updates or new features? Want to report a bug? Then send us an email to support@calimoto.com
Have a great ride!

Your calimoto team

We've added a third navigation mode. Now your map can also rotate into your driving direction in the regular 2D navigation.

We're so proud to finally announce the release of our latest feature after months of hard work! Our catalog with WORLDWIDE TOUR RECOMMENDATIONS will let you explore the best trips all over the world.

Thousands of tours await you! Check it out in the app and let us know your opinion.

You love your car as much as you love your bike?
Park them together in your calimoto garage.

Discovered trips whose beginning and end are close to one another, are automatically converted to roundtrips.

Those red via-markers of roundtrips can now be tapped and then set as the new beginning of the trip.

Upon starting the navigation, you'll find that it is now easier to choose between options that will affect the beginning of the navigation.

Lots of little improvements in this one:
- The newest motorcycle models are now supported by the garage
- Many more countries now support alerts for danger spots
- Added a back button to the POI overview screen during navigation
- Fixed wrong behaviour where some tracked tours were not uploaded to our servers due to an internal error
- Fixed crash upon registration and immediately editing profile
- Fixed wrong behaviour when trying to start navigation when the app has never before received a location update

Got any ideas for awesome updates or new features? Want to report a bug? Then send us an email to support@calimoto.com
Have a great ride!

Your calimoto team

- updated the app icon - don't worry it's still the same app
- issues while registering or logging are no longer
- text within the cockpit during navigation now resizes better
- minor layout issues were fixed in the profile screen

...and a few of under the hood performance improvements.

Your calimoto team
Bug fixes and performance improvement.

- A new category of favorites is at your disposal and it's called "HIGHLIGHT!". These new favorites can be created during a ride at an instant by accessing the shortcut menu.
- The design of the planner has received an overhaul. Not only is it better looking, it is now much more intuitive and easier to plan your next adventure than ever before!
- You may now tap anywhere on the screen during a navigation and will hear the last spoken instruction once more.

- The tracking of your tour will no longer stop automatically when you reach your destination, but continues to record until you manually stop it
- Turn instructions are now visible inside the map. Arrows that lay on top of your current route will point out your next turn
- The cockpit can now display the current time, battery level and the next street name
- Plenty of bug fixes: Tour highlights are once again selectable from within the map, favorites are synced much better across devices, your trip book is no longer stuck in the past year and the planner will make more sense of your selected routing profiles

- Crashes / bugs fixed
- You may add multiple photos to their tours at once

- The cockpit displays street names much better
- A few optimizations regarding the offline functionality

- The map has been brought up to date
- General performance improvements
